panels.description: Measures the average percentage of CPU time used by the Tracee process relative to the total number of CPU cores available.
panels.title: CPU Time (Tracee - Avg %)

panels.description: Average ratio of CPU usage by the Tracee process compared to the total non-idle CPU usage on the system.
panels.title: CPU Time Share (Tracee vs Non-Idle)

panels.description: Each line represents ONE SPECIFIC CPU percentage.
panels.title: CPU Time (All but idle - per core)
